Cetaphil, Hydrating Foaming Cream Cleanser

Brand: Cetaphil

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER, SODIUM COCOYL ISETHIONATE, GLYCERIN, GLYCOL DISTEARATE, SODIUM COCOYL GLUTAMATE, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, SODIUM LAUROYL SARCOSINATE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, ARGININE, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, SODIUM CHLORIDE, XANTHAN GUM, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, NIACINAMIDE, PANTHENOL, ALOE

SARCOSINATE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, ARGININE, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, SODIUM CHLORIDE, XANTHAN GUM, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, NIACINAMIDE, PANTHENOL, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE POWDER, PANTOLACTONE, CITRIC ACID
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
